issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add example that uses LogicalPlanBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8262](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8262). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add example that uses LogicalPlanBuilder

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8262?focusedCommentId=17180542) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
We now have a DataFrame API and an example for it. Users should not need to interact with logical plans now.
